price: Alamin ninyo na si Allāh ay matindi ang parusa at na si Allāh ay Mapagpatawad, Maawain.
arabic: ٱعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ شَدِيدُ ٱلۡعِقَابِ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٞ

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: iʿ'lamū anna al-laha shadīdu al-ʿiqābi wa-anna al-laha ghafūrun raḥīmun
